footer.description: Camino is the travel industry blockchain. Fueled by the Camino token, it is offering a versatile network to expand current business models and to create new touristic products to delight travelers and business partners.

auth.privateKeyInstructions: Enter your private key to access your wallet
auth.keystoreInstructions: Select your keystore file and enter password
auth.mnemonicInstructionsinfo: Your key phrase consists of 24 words separated by an empty space
auth.generateKeyPhrase: Generate a new key phrase to setup your Camino Wallet.
auth.keyPhraseDescription: Use these 24 words in sequential order to recover your Camino Wallet.
auth.keyPhraseWarning: Store this key phrase in a secure location. Anyone with this key phrase can access your Camino Wallet. There is no way to recover lost key phrases.
auth.confirmWrittenPhrase: I have written down my key phrase.
auth.termsPrefix: By using this application you agree to the
auth.confirmKeyPhraseDescription: Please enter the following words from your key phrase to confirm you have saved it.
